page.title: 18HOME LIFE
page.content: One girl in our class whose name is {Jill Hutchinson will be moving into {the Wheatsheaf}Hotel.Her dad is with workmen doing it out.They have knocked down an old garage and some huts in the yard.The garage was knocked down in the car park to make more space.Her dad is doing out the inside because it is a mess.It is a pub and also it takes lodgers.She will be moving in about November,it depends how long it takes to clean it all out.It is on the A177 that leads into Durham.It needs painting,new windows and curtains.
